*********************************************************************

term      | definition
--------- | -----------------------
DDL statements | Data Definition Language statements
DML statements | Data Modification Language statements
Primary Key | a key in a relational database that is unique for each record
Foreign Key | a column referring to the primary key in another table
RDBMS | Relational DataBase Management System
Parent table | a table containing a primary key that is related to at least one foreign key
Dependent table | a table containing one or more foreign keys (also called a child table)
